communication
Class RemoteConnection

java.lang.Object
  communication.RemoteConnection

public class RemoteConnection
extends java.lang.Object

Sets up a remote connection to a second nxt brick with the lejos.nxt.remote class, this allows the main brick to have access to the sensors on the slave brick See Example for how to implement: http://fedora.cis.cau.edu/~pmolnar/CIS687F12/Programming-LEGO-Robots/samples/src/org/lejos/sample/remotenxttest/RemoteNXTTest.java

          Sets up connection using RS485 connection over the two bricks
